Salma Mansouri", authorRole: "Consultante EDGE", date: "2025-01-03", category: "guides", categoryLabel: "Guides", image: "/images/news-5.jpg", featured: false, readTime: "8 min" }, { id: 6, title: "Ã‰tude de cas : projet rÃ©sidentiel certifiÃ© LEED", excerpt: "Analyse dÃ©taillÃ©e d'un projet rÃ©sidentiel tunisien ayant obtenu la certification LEED Gold.", content: "Ce projet rÃ©sidentiel de 200 logements situÃ© Ã  Tunis reprÃ©sente un exemple concret de rÃ©ussite en matiÃ¨re de construction durable...", author: "Ing.
